title: KKR Banks Its Biggest Buyout Fund Yet at $19 Billion
sub_head: The fund includes $2 billion from the New York firm and surpassed its $17.6 billion fund raised in 2006
body:
KKR & Co. wrapped up its largest-ever buyout fund with $19 billion in investor commitments in a fundraising effort that broke an in-house record that has stood for more than 15 years.
The New York-based firmâ€™s latest vehicle, KKR North America Fund XIII, is about 8% bigger than the $17.6 billion it collected for its KKR 2006 Fund LP and includes...
